trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when there is an attempt to access an unloaded class.
trans-unit.target: 當試著存取已卸載的類別時，所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.TypeUnloadedException> uses the HRESULT COR_E_TYPEUNLOADED, that has the value 0x80131013.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TypeUnloadedException> 會使用 HRESULT COR_E_TYPEUNLOADED，具有 0x80131013 的值。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.TypeUnloadedException>, see the <xref:System.TypeUnloadedException.%23ctor%2A> constructors.
trans-unit.target: 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單<xref:System.TypeUnloadedException>，請參閱<xref:System.TypeUnloadedException.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes new instance of the <see cref="T:System.TypeUnloadedException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.TypeUnloadedException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.TypeUnloadedException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.TypeUnloadedException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Type has been unloaded."
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性的新執行個體的系統提供的訊息描述錯誤，例如 「 類型已經卸載。 」

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此訊息會考量目前的系統文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.TypeUnloadedException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.TypeUnloadedException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述錯誤的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.TypeUnloadedException" /> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.TypeUnloadedException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The content of the `message` paramater should be understandable to the end user.
trans-unit.target: 內容`message`數參數應該要能夠讓終端使用者。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.TypeUnloadedException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.TypeUnloadedException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 存放序列物件資料的物件。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 關於來源或目的端的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.TypeUnloadedException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 使用序列化資料，初始化 <see cref="T:System.TypeUnloadedException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 參數不是 Null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)，則會在處理內部例外狀況的 <see langword="catch" /> 區塊中引發目前的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.TypeUnloadedException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.TypeUnloadedException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception can include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 直接因為前一個例外狀況而擲回的例外狀況可能包含對 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性中前一個例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `Nothing` 屬性不提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.TypeUnloadedException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.TypeUnloadedException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: The inner exception reference.
trans-unit.target: 內部例外狀況參考。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤訊息字串。
